participant_1.background:
I love my mom's home cooked meals.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
I spend my days working, caring for my son, and volunteering at my local animal shelter.
i am twenty five years old.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.
I'm a pretty short guy, but I make up for it with my big personality.
i am a gentle giant.
I like dressing up for special occasions, but I prefer to wear comfortable clothing on a regular day.
I fear that my family will be judged for the way they are.

content.text: What do you like most about your family?
I love that they are always there for me, no matter what.
That's great to hear! What's your favorite thing to do with them?
We love to cook together, and we always have a good time.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook too, but I don't have anyone to cook with.
Well, you're always welcome to join us for dinner!
Thanks for the offer! I might just take you up on that.
Great! We'd love to have you.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to play the guitar, and I also enjoy volunteering at my local animal shelter.
That's great! I love to play the guitar too.
Oh, really? That's awesome! What kind of music do you like to play?
I mostly play country music, but I also like to play some rock and roll.
That's cool! I like to play a little bit of everything, but my favorite is probably blues.
I love blues music too! It's so soulful.
It is! I love the way it makes me feel.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
